ground_truth.solution:
a) Ta c√≥:

a) Cho ƒëa th·ª©c \[ P\left(x\right)=\left(6x^{5}‚àí\frac{1}{2}x^{4}+\frac{1}{3}x^{3}\right):\left(2x^{3}\right). \] R√∫t g·ªçn r·ªìi t√≠nh gi√° tr·ªã c·ªßa P(x) t·∫°i x = ‚Äì2.
b) Cho ƒëa th·ª©c \[ Q\left(x\right)=3\left(\frac{2x}{3}‚àí1\right)+\left(15x^{2}‚àí10x\right):\left(‚àí5x\right)‚àí\left(3x‚àí1\right) \]. R√∫t g·ªçn r·ªìi t√≠nh gi√° tr·ªã c·ªßa Q(x) t·∫°i x = \[ \frac{1}{3} \].

ground_truth.solution:
a) \[ P\left(x\right)=\left(6x^{5}‚àí\frac{1}{2}x^{4}+\frac{1}{3}x^{3}\right):\left(2x^{3}\right) \]
\[ =\left(6x^{5}:2x^{3}\right)‚àí\left(\frac{1}{2}x^{4}:2x^{3}\right)+\left(\frac{1}{3}x^{3}:2x^{3}\right) \]
\[ =\left(6:2\right).\left(x^{5}:x^{3}\right)‚àí\left(\frac{1}{2}:2\right).\left(x^{4}:x^{3}\right)+\left(\frac{1}{3}:2\right).\left(x^{3}:x^{3}\right) \]
\[ =3.x^{5‚àí3}‚àí\frac{1}{4}.x^{4‚àí3}+\frac{1}{6}.x^{3‚àí3} \]
\[ =3.x^{2}‚àí\frac{1}{4}.x^{1}+\frac{1}{6}.x^{0} \]
\[ =3x^{2}‚àí\frac{1}{4}x+\frac{1}{6}. \]
Thay x = ‚Äì2 v√†o \[ P\left(x\right)=3x^{2}‚àí\frac{1}{4}x+\frac{1}{6} \] ta ƒë∆∞·ª£c:
\[ P\left(‚àí2\right)=3.\left(‚àí2\right)^{2}‚àí\frac{1}{4}.\left(‚àí2\right)+\frac{1}{6}=3.4+\frac{1}{2}+\frac{1}{6} \]
\[ =\frac{72+3+1}{6}=\frac{76}{6}=\frac{38}{3}. \]
V·∫≠y t·∫°i x = ‚Äì2 th√¨ P(x) c√≥ gi√° tr·ªã b·∫±ng \[ \frac{38}{3}. \]
b) \[ Q\left(x\right)=3\left(\frac{2x}{3}‚àí1\right)+\left(15x^{2}‚àí10x\right):\left(‚àí5x\right)‚àí\left(3x‚àí1\right) \]
\[ =3.\frac{2x}{3}‚àí3.1+\left(15x^{2}:\left(‚àí5x\right)\right)‚àí\left(10x:\left(‚àí5x\right)\right)‚àí3x+1 \]
= 2x ‚Äì 3 + (‚Äì3x) ‚Äì (‚Äì 2) ‚Äì 3x + 1
= [2x + (‚Äì 3x) ‚Äì 3x] + [‚Äì 3 ‚Äì (‚Äì2) + 1]
= ‚Äì 4x.
Thay \[ x=\frac{1}{3} \] v√†o Q(x) = ‚Äì 4x ta ƒë∆∞·ª£c:
\[ Q\left(\frac{1}{3}\right)=‚àí4.\frac{1}{3}=‚àí\frac{4}{3}. \]

ground_truth.answer:
